Interface ICinemaBooking

All Known Implementing Classes:

  • Method Details

    • bookSeat

      void bookSeat(String seatRow, int seatCol, int customerID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Book a seat with given row and col. Additional information such as customerID is also stored
      Parameters:
      seatRow -
      seatCol -
      customerID -
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • isBooked

      boolean isBooked(String seatRow, int seatCol) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Check if a seat is booked by a customer. Takes in coordinates of seat to check
      Parameters:
      seatRow -
      seatCol -
      Returns:
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if row or col not valid

    • removeBooking

      void removeBooking(int cinemaID, String seatRow, int seatCol) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Removes a booking by a customer. Sets the isBook flag to 0 to indicate the seat is avilable
      Parameters:
      cinemaID -
      seatRow -
      seatCol -
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if row or col not valid || if the seat was not booked.

    • getMultiplier

      float getMultiplier()
      Returns a multiplier based on the type of the cinema Each subclass will return a different multiplier

    • printCinemaLayout

      void printCinemaLayout()
      Print layout. Each subclass will specialise and print a different format
